Description.Name: Quarantine
Description.Details:
Darius assembles the staff for an emergency meeting. "We have an update on [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s ailment.  It appears that {TGT_MW.SUBJ} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:has|Default:have} contracted a rare, potentially fatal microbial pathogen.  We suspect it was during an encounter with Syndicate operatives on a recent shore excursion. We need to isolate an entire MedBay until {TGT_MW.Subj} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:recover|Default:recovers}, as we do not know how contagious they may be. We can get a series of broad spectrum antibiotics from {TGT_SYSTEM.Name} for ¢170,000. A steep price, but probably necessary."

Sumire volunteers, "I know somebody at a local pharmaceutical research lab. They have the equipment to scan [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]]'s blood and provide us with a set of targeted antivirals.  It's not cheap though, so expect the bill to come in around ¢500,000 to get us access to the drug."

Description.Name: death
Description.Details:
[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is quarantined in one of the MedBays and provided a generic symptomatic treatment. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} soon joined by [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and not long after that, [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] falls ill as well.

Rumors and fear spread faster than the virus, with stories of disfiguring boils, raging fevers, and delirium. Everyone finds themselves praying to whatever gods they worship.

Eventually, it is clear the quarantine has successfully limited the spread of the disease. Unfortunately, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] was too far gone for the treatment to reverse the effects of the pathogen.  For [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]], however, the road to recovery will be extremely long and unpleasant.

Description.Name: Pay for the broad spectrum antibiotics.
death
Description.Details:
[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is quarantined in one of the MedBays and the medication administered. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} soon joined by [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and not long after that, [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] falls ill as well.

Rumors and fear spread faster than the virus, with stories of disfiguring boils, raging fevers, and delirium. Everyone finds themselves praying to whatever gods they worship.

Unfortunately, [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is too sick for the drugs to be effective.  Nobody else gets sick, but [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] are going to face a long, slow road to recovery.

Description.Name: long time out
Description.Details:
[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is quarantined in one of the MedBays and the medication administered. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} soon joined by [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]], and not long after that, [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] falls ill as well.

Rumors and fear spread faster than the virus, with stories of disfiguring boils, raging fevers, and delirium. Everyone finds themselves praying to whatever gods they worship.

But the drugs provided by the planet do their job, stopping the contagion in its tracks. Nobody else gets sick, but the three MechWarriors who were infected are going to face a long, slow road to recovery.

Description.Name: medium time out
Description.Details:
[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is quarantined in one of the MedBays and the antivirals administered. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} soon joined by [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]].

Fearful rumors of the virus are countered by the story of Sumire's acquisition of the antivirals.

While these two MechWarriors will be out of commission for a while, the dangerous time passes quickly, leaving them exhausted but recovering.

Description.Name: short time out
Description.Details:
[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] is quarantined in one of the Hospital MedBays and the antiviral are quickly created and administered. {TGT_MW.Subj_C} {TGT_MW.Gender?NonBinary:are|Default:is} soon joined by [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]].

The cutting edge technology of the fully functioning Argo Hospital quickly quells and fear and rumours.

While these two MechWarriors will be out of commission for a while, the dangerous time passes quickly, leaving them exhausted but recovering.
